channel.title: data.table on Home
channel.description: Recent content in data.table on Home

item.title: Learning Japanese with data.table and ggplot2
item.description: This post is about drawing hiragana and katakana tables using R, data.table, and ggplot2. The objective was to better illustrate the rules that underlie these two Japanese writing systems.

item.title: A data.table and dplyr tour
item.description: data.table and dplyr are two R packages that both aim at an easier and more efficient manipulation of data frames. This article shows how they can be used to execute common data munging tasks. The commands are presented side-by-side to facilitate the comparison.
